short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your domain with Gmail for free! Forward emails to Gmail, send as your domain. Simple setup for personal/business email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you will be able to connect your domain to your Gmail mail.
First, you set up mail forwarding from your domain to your Gmail account.
Next, you will set up sending mail from Gmail on behalf of your domain.
That's it, you now have personal/business mail for free!
